item.description:
Good News Everyone!
We are having another movie marathon at the Somerville Theater!

This is the night session of the Movie Marathon. We split the meetups so you could go to one if you couldn't make both. Please RSVP to both if you are going to both.

We booked the screening room at the Somerville Theater on August 13th! We'll take a break in between the afternoon and the evening session to pick up dinner around Davis Square, we have the room from 2pm to 11pm.

Because renting the screening room at the theater is not free, there is a charge to this meetup. All proceeds will go toward the renting of the room and expenses related to the meetup.

I talked to theater and they said we can bring in whatever we want as long as it isn't hard liquor. Beer and hard cider are served on the premise as well :-)

The theme for the marathon will be Star Wars.
7:00 to  9:00 Star Wars V: The Empire Strikes Back
9:15 to 11:00 Fanboys

See you there!
-Josh
item.how_to_find_us: We will be in the downstairs private theater on the way to the Museum of Bad Art.
item.name: Star Wars Movie Marathon, Night Session
